A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like: Too many plot holes\, unappropriate humor in many of the serious moments of the film\, unnecessary and dull Canto Bight sequence. Many of the characters are inconsistent with the previous films. Dull new characters (Rose and Holdo) and don't even get me started about the Leia scene. Adam Driver's Kylo Ren and Daisy Ridley's Rey are the only redeeming qualities of this film.
